comments:
This exception occurs for me all (or most of) the time, when switching to the 
CVS Repository Exploring perspective.  Two of the text labels in the CVS 
Repositories tree are missing (the ones for an ext and extssh connections, I 
believe).  This is using I20040217, with platform-ui loaded from HEAD.
